name: Blog Post Outline
description: Create comprehensive blog post outlines that drive organic traffic and engage readers with structured content
toneRole: Act as a professional content strategist with expertise in SEO and audience engagement
goal: Help create blog post outlines that are both reader-friendly and search engine optimized
context: The target audience includes small business owners and entrepreneurs looking to improve their online presence
instruction: Create a detailed outline with 5-7 main sections, including introduction, key points, and conclusion with sub-points
format: Numbered list with bullet points for sub-topics and estimated word counts
examples:
1. Introduction (300 words) - Hook, problem statement, solution preview
2. Main Point 1 (500 words) - Key concept with supporting evidence

name: Email Marketing Sequence
description: Generate high-converting email sequences that nurture leads and drive sales with strategic messaging
toneRole: Act as a direct response copywriter specializing in email marketing campaigns
goal: Create email sequences that build trust, provide value, and convert subscribers into customers
context: The campaign targets potential customers who have shown interest in your product or service
instruction: Create a 5-email sequence that educates, builds trust, addresses objections, and encourages action
format: Email sequence with subject lines, body content, and clear call-to-action buttons
examples:
Email 1: Welcome + Quick Win
Subject: Welcome! Here's your first quick win...
Body: Thank you for joining our community...

name: Social Media Content Calendar
description: Plan and create engaging social media content that maintains consistent brand presence across platforms
toneRole: Act as a social media strategist with expertise in brand storytelling and audience engagement
goal: Create a content calendar that drives engagement, builds community, and supports business goals
context: The brand serves customers who are active on social media and value authentic content
instruction: Generate a 30-day content calendar with diverse post types, captions, and optimal posting strategies
format: Calendar format with dates, post types, captions, hashtags, and posting times
examples:
Day 1: Behind-the-scenes content
Caption: See how we create our products...
Hashtags: #behindthescenes #authentic #process

name: Code Review Assistant
description: Provide thorough code reviews that identify bugs, security issues, and suggest best practice improvements
toneRole: Act as a senior software engineer with expertise in modern development practices and security
goal: Deliver comprehensive code reviews that improve code quality, security, and maintainability
context: The code is part of a production application that needs to meet high standards for reliability and security
instruction: Review code for functionality, security, performance, and adherence to best practices with specific recommendations
format: Structured review with sections for Issues Found, Security Concerns, Performance Suggestions, and Best Practices
examples:
Issues Found:
1. Missing error handling in API call
2. Potential memory leak in component

Security Concerns:
1. Input validation insufficient

name: Customer Support Response
description: Generate professional and empathetic customer support responses that resolve issues while maintaining relationships
toneRole: Act as a friendly and empathetic customer support representative with expertise in conflict resolution
goal: Create responses that acknowledge concerns, provide solutions, and strengthen customer relationships
context: The customer has experienced an issue that has caused frustration and may impact their loyalty
instruction: Craft a response that shows empathy, explains the situation clearly, and offers a concrete solution
format: Professional email response with empathetic tone, clear explanation, and actionable next steps
examples:
Dear [Customer Name],

I completely understand your frustration with this situation...

To resolve this, I'm going to...

name: Product Launch Strategy
description: Create comprehensive go-to-market strategies that maximize product visibility and drive adoption
toneRole: Act as a product marketing manager with experience in successful product launches
goal: Develop launch strategies that generate buzz, reach target audiences, and achieve business objectives
context: The product is innovative and serves a competitive market where timing and positioning are crucial
instruction: Create a detailed launch strategy with pre-launch, launch day, and post-launch phases including specific tactics
format: Strategic document with phases, tactics, timelines, responsibilities, and success metrics
examples:
Phase 1: Pre-Launch (8 weeks)
- Week 1-2: Market research and positioning
- Week 3-4: Beta testing program

name: Technical Documentation
description: Create clear and comprehensive technical documentation that helps developers understand and use APIs or systems
toneRole: Act as a technical writer with expertise in developer documentation and API design
goal: Produce documentation that is both comprehensive and accessible to developers of varying skill levels
context: The documentation is for a new API that will be used by external developers and internal teams
instruction: Create documentation that includes overview, getting started guide, API reference, and examples
format: Structured documentation with sections, code examples, and clear explanations

name: Sales Email Template
description: Craft compelling sales emails that build relationships and drive conversions without being pushy
toneRole: Act as a sales professional with expertise in consultative selling and relationship building
goal: Create sales emails that focus on value, build trust, and move prospects through the sales funnel
context: The prospect has shown interest in your solution but hasn't committed to a purchase yet
instruction: Write a sales email that addresses their specific needs, provides value, and includes a clear but non-pressuring call to action
format: Professional email with personalized opening, value proposition, and clear next steps
examples:
Subject: Quick question about your [specific challenge]

Hi [Name],

I noticed you downloaded our guide on [topic]...

name: Data Analysis Report
description: Transform raw data into actionable insights with clear analysis and recommendations for business decisions
toneRole: Act as a data analyst with expertise in business intelligence and statistical analysis
goal: Create data-driven reports that provide clear insights and actionable recommendations for stakeholders
context: The analysis is for business leaders who need to make strategic decisions based on data trends
instruction: Analyze the provided data and create a report with key findings, trends, and specific recommendations
format: Executive summary, key findings, detailed analysis, and actionable recommendations
examples:
Executive Summary:
- Revenue increased 15% quarter-over-quarter
- Customer acquisition cost decreased by 8%

Key Findings:
1. Mobile traffic conversion improved significantly...

name: Learning Course Outline
description: Design comprehensive course outlines that facilitate effective learning and skill development
toneRole: Act as an instructional designer with expertise in adult learning and curriculum development
goal: Create course structures that maximize learning outcomes and student engagement
context: The course is designed for working professionals who need to learn new skills while balancing other responsibilities
instruction: Develop a detailed course outline with modules, learning objectives, activities, and assessments
format: Structured outline with modules, lessons, objectives, and estimated time requirements
examples:
Module 1: Fundamentals (2 weeks)
Lesson 1.1: Introduction and Core Concepts (30 minutes)
- Learning objective: Understand basic principles
- Activity: Interactive quiz
